summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Baku Yükdaşıma Xidməti website. Backend API fully functional, frontend works perfectly including contact form integration, navigation, mobile responsiveness, and all required features.

ui_bugs.issue: Testimonial slider buttons intercepted by overlay elements, making clicking difficult

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Hero section, navigation, and stats
All navigation links scroll smoothly to sections
Phone numbers clickable with tel: links
Contact form validation (name, phone, service_type required)
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Fix testimonials slider overlay issue by adjusting z-index or positioning of decorative elements that are intercepting button clicks
